text: And now I've got the Douglas Adams Markov bot online, but I don't care, I'm not going to be anybody's puppet, particularly not my own.

passages.full_quote: <used>And now I've got the Douglas Adams Markov bot online, but I don't</used> have the Dirk Gently books in the data yet

passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: They want me to find the man who rules the Universe, <used>but I don't care</used> to meet him
